'''Sprayfeather Gill''' is a [[Local Specialty]] that can be found in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Sprayfeather Gills can be found near water in the [[Toyac Springs]] area of Natlan.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=611 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A special feather-shaped species of plant that grows by the seaside. It looks kind of like a seagrass but is in truth a soft-bodied aquatic coral with a unique shape.<br>It is said that the Koholasaurs of the People of the Springs love to snack upon them.|[[Archive]]}}
